resources.string:
Zchedule Provides complete information replica of what you see in your FFCS. Currently we only provide service to VIT Chennai Campus. Our Privacy Policy helps explain our information practices. For Example, we talk about information we collect and how this affects you. We also explain the steps we take to protect your privacy without compromising on the quality of service.
Whenever we say \'Zchedule\', \'our\', \'we\', we refer to developers of Zchedule , Fourth State Lab. And those will be only and only 2 persons who will be hold responsible Sparsha(9790722134) and Sridhar(9790700912).
This Privacy Policy applies only to Zchedule x.x.x .
Zchedule collects information when we operate and provide information, which is Login and Sync.

You provide your FFCS account information which includes you Registration number and FFCS password only. Zchedule doesn\'t collect any other account information either from your phone, or your FFCS automatically other then running semester\'s Courses, TimeTable, Attendance and Assignments, not even your name.

Your information is transferred to servers within encrypted Basic Authentication headers through HTTPS(HTTP with SSL Certificate Validation) protocol using POST method. Hence, your Highly confidential credentials can neither be sniffed, tampered or blocked by any third party.

Your information is stored nowhere else other then your own personal mobile phone and this information can never be accessed by any one, not even you. However, your credentials are cached in servers for 3 minutes since your last request to provide faster services. And while cached no one can see those information, not even we can see or tamper with that information.
Your information is not logged anywhere, neither on your phone\'s logger nor on server\'s logger.

Login : When you log-in from giving your credentials, we allocate a server for you to which your information will be sent to provide service(in this process your credentials are not used). Later, your information is sent to the allocated server, which logs you in using VIT\'s FFCS Login Form, and your credentials are now cached for 3 minutes in the server and saved in your phone after successful login.
Syncing : When you open the app for the second time, Zchedule then synchronises your FFCS information to your phone following VIT\'s FFCS Login Procedure again. This time your credentials are collected from your phone directly which was saved when login.
We can assure you that, we neither collect or temper with any information in your FFCS. Our sole motive is to directly send you information only about running semester\'s Courses, Time-Table , Attendance and Assignments and that\'s all.
Absolutely nothing, we do not share any information with any third party or any other machine than our servers. We respect your privacy, which is not to share any information without you knowing.
To report copyright infringement and request that Zchedule App remove any infringement content it is hosting, please email to fourthstatelab@gmail.com .
